CosmereScadrial.Def.AllomanticAbilityDef.label: compound bronze
CosmereScadrial.Def.AllomanticAbilityDef.description: Compounding bronze drowns the mind in exhaustion. Eyes flutter, limbs weaken, and each heartbeat feels distant â€” all to trap alertness within the metalmind. Sleep now, so that one day you may run for days without rest.
